message.body: Lorenne! Ive got a place for you in phillytown -gabi
I need a stop halfway between DC and NY
I would be getting in around 7:30 or 8,
You could host me for the night? That would be great!
Surely! Im in class until 830. My bass teacher is playing a gig if you wanna come out and see some jazz.
Awesome. Can I confirm with you later? So I'll just hang till you can get out? Not sure how I'll feel but if I'm good then I would love to see some jazz!
Cool, sure. Theres a good coffee shop and bar around the corner if you need somewhere to hang til im out. Ultimo coffee and south philly taproom
Hey so I don't have a sleeping bag or anything, that ok? I'll just take the couch?
That's fine, i've got extra linens and/or a sleeping bag
